channel.title: Giampaolo Rodola - aix
channel.description: Python enthusiast, core developer, psutil author

item.title: psutil 5.4.0 and AIX support
item.description: After a long time psutil finally adds support for a brand new exotic platform: AIX! Honestly I am not sure how many AIX Python users are out there (I suppose not many) but still, here it is. For this we have to thank Arnon Yaari who started working on the â€¦
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
